HONBS.HE.summary: Honkarakenne Oyj designs, manufactures, and sells log and solid wood building packages. It offers contemporary homes, log cabins and holiday lodges, and traditional and custom log homes, as well as commercial developments, such as hotels, restaurants, schools, day care centres, clinics, and holiday villages. The company sells its houses under the Honka brand name in Finland, Russia, Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan, other CIS countries, and internationally. Honkarakenne Oyj was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Karstula, Finland.
